tidbits.title: Rich History and Legends
tidbits.description: Romania is rich in history and folklore, with medieval castles like Bran Castle and legends of Dracula captivating visitors.

tidbits.title: Natural Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse natural landscapes, from the Carpathian Mountains to the Danube Delta, offering scenic beauty and wildlife.

tidbits.title: Cultural Traditions
tidbits.description: Romania preserves cultural traditions like folk dances, pottery, and traditional cuisine, reflecting its heritage and rural life.
